title: Are there any successful startups dealing with wearable technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many successful start-ups are dealing with wearable technology I have shorted out some here: -> Oculusrift: Today, most of the people are familiar with this wearable technology so i don't think so to explain it in deep. ->Google glass: This is also one of the most successful wearable technology available in market. ->Apple watch: I believe that you knew it very well. So, finally i want to say that there are so many companies available in market that offer great services on wearable development you can see that here: 1) Wearable Tech LA 2)OpenXcell Technolabs Pvt Ltd.

Atlas Fitness Monitor (Atlas Wearables) seem to be doing pretty well. They have't shipped their first product yet, but they're off to a good start with a Kickstarter backing and pre-orders for their product.
